    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Run through all action in the specific states. If an Exception occurs (mainly in RunActionState) the FSM assumes the plan failed. If an action state returns false the FSM assumes the plan finished.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - unit whose actions are getting cycled.
